positive_findings.details: Comprehensive default SEO config with Open Graph, Twitter cards, and meta tags
Proper lang attribute mapping (en-CA, fr-CA, zh-CN) implemented
404.tsx and _error.tsx properly set noindex, nofollow, nosnippet
All affiliate dashboard pages have proper noindex directives
Preview tokens properly block indexing with noindex, nofollow
Post-purchase pages properly excluded from indexing
useEnhancedSEO hook generates canonical URLs with locale support
OG tags present with type, url, title, description, locale, images
Hreflang tags generated for all supported locales (en, fr, zh, es)

critical_issues.issue: Admin pages only have <title> without noindex directive
critical_issues.impact: Admin pages could be indexed by search engines, exposing internal tools and potentially creating security/privacy issues
critical_issues.recommendation: Add <meta name="robots" content="noindex, nofollow" /> to all admin pages or use NextSeo with noindex prop

critical_issues.issue: Customer portal pages lack noindex directive
critical_issues.impact: Private customer data pages could appear in search results
critical_issues.recommendation: Add noindex, nofollow to all authenticated customer portal pages

critical_issues.issue: Retailer portal pages may lack proper noindex
critical_issues.impact: B2B portal pages could be indexed
critical_issues.recommendation: Verify and add noindex to all retailer portal pages

warnings.issue: Mixed usage of NextSeo vs raw Head component
warnings.details: Some pages use NextSeo (recommended), others use next/head with manual meta tags
warnings.recommendation: Standardize on NextSeo for consistency across all pages
